mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, username, password, hp, is_active, role, join_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{hp}, #{isActive, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{role}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS user_id, email, username, password, hp, affiliation, is_active AS isActive, role, join_at AS joinAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, hp = #{hp}, role= #{role}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE email = #{email}) AS emailExists
